#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
bool vis[100010]={false};
vector<ll>v[100010];

ll solve(ll i)
{
	ll ans=0;
	queue<ll>q;
	q.push(i);
	vis[i]=true;
	while(!q.empty())
	{
		ll y=q.front();
		q.pop();
		for(i=0;i<v[y].size();i++)
		{
			ll viv=v[y][i];
			if(!vis[viv])
			{
				vis[viv]=true;
				ans++;
				q.push(viv);
			}
		}
	}
	return ans;
}
int main()
{
	ll n,i,no1,no2;
	cin>>n;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>no1;
		cin>>no2;
		v[no1].push_back(no2);
		v[no2].push_back(no1);
	}
	ll p=0,k=0,str[100010];
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		if(!vis[i])
		{
			k++;;
			ll ans=solve(i);
			str[p++]=ans;
		}
	}
	cout<<k<<endl;
	sort(str,str+p);
	for(i=0;i<p;i++)
		cout<<str[i]+1<<" ";
}
